42 #include "Teuchos_XMLInputSource.hpp"
43 #include "Teuchos_TreeBuildingXMLHandler.hpp"
44 
45 
46 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_EXPAT
47 # include "Teuchos_ExpatHandlerAdapter.hpp"
48 # define EXPAT_BUFSIZE 8192
49 #else
50 # include "Teuchos_XMLParser.hpp"
51 #endif
52 
53 using namespace Teuchos;
54 
55 XMLObject XMLInputSource::getObject() const
56 {
57 
58 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_EXPAT
59 
60  RCP<TreeBuildingXMLHandler> handler = rcp(new TreeBuildingXMLHandler());
61 
62  XML_Parser parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
63 
64  XML_SetElementHandler(parser, expatStartElementHandler,
65  expatEndElementHandler);
66 
67  XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, expatCharacterDataHandler);
68 
69  XML_SetUserData(parser, (void*) &(*handler));
70 
71  RCP<XMLInputStream> s = stream();
72 
73  bool done = false;
74  unsigned int bufsize = EXPAT_BUFSIZE;
75  unsigned char buf[EXPAT_BUFSIZE];
76 
77  while (!done)
78  {
79  unsigned int nRead = s->readBytes(buf, bufsize);
80  if (nRead < bufsize)
81  {
82  done = true;
83  }
84  XML_Parse(parser, (char*) buf, bufsize, done);
85  }
86 
87  return handler->getObject();
88 
89 #else
90 
91  XMLParser parser(stream());
92 
93  return parser.parse();
94 
95 #endif
96 
97 }
98
